Articles.Content:
- Can't change vessel name that I have launched in space center after installation 1.1.2.  But somehow can change the obj that I need to rescue from a quest.

- It will be great if the game has 16:9 resolution setting that are less than 1920x1080.

- Show only MNV ships in space center feature.

 

Thanks for your great work.  I really love this game.

Edited May 1, 2016 by BJK
